item.description:
Join P-Collective members Caroline and Bob at Fete for a night of rowdy Balkan brass!

"Fête presents a World Music Dance Party event featuring: Klezwoods, Emperor Norton's Stationary Marching Band and Somerville Symphony Orkestar. This is a show that only Fête would present! A grand celebration event with belly dancers, marching bands, klezmer/balkan music, gypsy-punk and much more. CD release tour for Klezwoods; ENSMB, SSO and Klezwoods. Together they will put on an amazing show that will be remembered!"

Doors open at 8pm

Show starts at 9pm

We first saw Emperor Norton, a Somerville, MA based band (similar vibe as What Cheer? Brigade) last fall during PRONK!  Exciting to have them back in PVD.

For more info and to purchase tickets: http://www.fetemusic.com/event/world-music-dance-party/

For a few music samples check out:

Klezwoods: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=peQEcb3HjLk

ENSMB:http://www.ensmb.com/music.html

Somerville Symphony Orkestar: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3uW2Pt0QaA

See you on the 6th!
item.how_to_find_us: Caroline and Bob are hosting - check ot our photos. Caroline will be wearing a white scarf, Elsbeth style. Bob's cell phone is 413 441 5064
item.name: Emperor Norton's Stationary Marching Band at Fete!
